SerialTerminal * GetTerminal () const

Detailed Description

SerialTerminalSocket implements a socket interface to Serial terminal. Base class of MmCallServerSocket and MmCallSocket.

void SerialTerminalSocket::SetSocketEventListener (  SocketEventListener *  listener  )  [virtual]
 

Set the socket listener to receive callbacks, when socket events occour. The application holding the listener and the observed socket must be within the same application context!

Parameters:
listener the MmCallSocketListener

Reimplemented from Socket.

void SerialTerminalSocket::SetTerminal (  SerialTerminal *  terminal  ) 
 

Set the terminal which is used by the socket for data transfer Read and Write at the socket fail if terminal is not propperly set. The client application of the socket has to take care about correct obtaining an releasing of the terminal. The SocketEventListener of the socket must be set to a valid SocketEventListener (!0) before the terminal can be set.
